objects.text: 3 Versatile Jars • Powerful Motor • Multiple Speed Settings • Premium Stainless Steel Blades

product_details.name: Sujata Dynamix Power Mixer Grinder - 3 Jars | Premium Kitchen Powerhouse
product_details.description:
• Powerful motor for efficient grinding and mixing performance
• Comes with 3 versatile stainless steel jars for different grinding needs
• Transparent dome-shaped lids with measuring cup functionality
• Ergonomic jar handles for comfortable grip and pouring
• Speed control dial with multiple settings (Low, Med, High)
• Durable stainless steel blades for consistent grinding
• Sturdy white ABS body construction for long-lasting use
• Safety-lock mechanism for secure operation
• Ideal for wet & dry grinding, chutney making, and blending
• Compact design perfect for modern kitchens
• Easy to clean and maintain
• Perfect for Indian cooking needs
• Anti-skid feet for stable operation
• Overload protection for motor safety

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek and modern design with a technology-inspired gradient background transitioning from deep navy blue (#2C3E50) to teal (#4CA1AF), overlaid with subtle noise and circular design elements to create depth. At the center, there's a high-resolution product image of a mixer grinder. Above the product, the main heading (`heading`) is bold and white, complemented by a smaller, futuristic subheading (`subheading`). A motivational tagline (`tagline`) in teal captures attention. Below the product, a description (`description`) highlights key features, followed by a secondary tagline (`tagline_2`). A bold price (`price`) and a teal rectangular call-to-action button with “SHOP NOW” (`cta`) complete the layout.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy Blue: #2C3E50  
- Teal Gradient: #4CA1AF  
- Accent Teal: #4ECDC4  
- Button Text: #1A2A30  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a modern mixer grinder set with a clean and sophisticated color palette. Dominated by glossy white (#F4F4F4) and polished metallic silver (#C0C0C0), the design emphasizes hygiene and elegance. Chrome accents (#A9A9A9) on the lids and handles add a sleek, professional finish. Subtle clear plastic parts (#EAEAEA) create delicate transitions between metal and plastic elements. A pop of bright purple (#7E3F98) on the control knob draws attention while breaking the monochrome scheme, enhancing visual appeal. Ideal colors for the advertisement banner include white, silver, grey, and purple, with gradients blending white and silver for a refined and high-end look.
